item.title: By: topheim

item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://projectpinkday.com/portfolio/beach-life-first-week-impressions/comment-page-1/#comment-79">Sharon</a>.
Thanks Sharon for the kind words. Glad you are enjoying the blog.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Sharon.

Thanks Sharon for the kind words. Glad you are enjoying the blog.

LikeLike

item.title: By: Sharon
item.dc:creator: Sharon
item.description: Thanks so much for sharing! Your experiences and findings reminds me everyday to keep things I need to a minimal. I found myself cleaning then accumulating some more. But I am getting up to the courage to do the same soon. sometimes, I read it multiple times for a daily reminder! This is such a inspiring and encouraging blog, because you really did it! leaving nice career, stable life behind and just go for it. It really makes me feel that I can do it too (instead of just "day dreaming"). because it is so real! I look forward to read more about your journey and findings. I started a blog so long ago and did not even try to keep it going. so I will start again. thanks to you.
item.content:encoded:
Thanks so much for sharing! Your experiences and findings reminds me everyday to keep things I need to a minimal. I found myself cleaning then accumulating some more. But I am getting up to the courage to do the same soon. sometimes, I read it multiple times for a daily reminder! This is such a inspiring and encouraging blog, because you really did it! leaving nice career, stable life behind and just go for it. It really makes me feel that I can do it too (instead of just “day dreaming”). because it is so real! I look forward to read more about your journey and findings. I started a blog so long ago and did not even try to keep it going. so I will start again. thanks to you.

LikeLike
